title: Structured error handling - Backend queries

title: Phase 9: Polish & Cross-Cutting Concerns
description: Loading states, dark mode, accessibility, performance optimization, data export, and final production readiness tasks.

title: T150z-ab: Error handling tests
description: Test transaction rollback on constraint violation, concurrent activity creation, update_activity with all None fields

title: T150i-k: Mood command validation tests
description: Test log_mood with: notes >5k chars, boundary ratings (0,6,-1,100), large activity_ids array (50+)

title: Phase 7.5: Critical Test Coverage Gaps
description: Address missing test coverage identified in gap analysis (target 80%+). Includes validation tests, boundary conditions, and error handling tests.

title: T150d-h: Assessment command validation tests
description: Test submit_assessment with: notes >10k chars, invalid control characters, type code >10 chars, non-alphanumeric type code, empty type code

title: Phase 8.5: US7 Dashboard Assessment Score Overview
description: Display most recent assessment scores on dashboard with visual progress bars showing severity ranges. 22 tasks total.

title: T181: Loading states with Svelte transitions
description: Implement loading states for all async operations using Svelte transitions

title: T186: Accessibility labels (ARIA)
description: Add ARIA labels to all interactive components for screen reader support

title: Structured error handling - Frontend
description: Update retry.ts and errors.ts to use CommandError type guards instead of string parsing. Create ErrorMessage component.

title: T150n-s: Query edge case tests

title: T185: Dark mode theme toggle

title: T187: SQLite query optimization
description: Use EXPLAIN ANALYZE, add indexes if needed, convert high-frequency queries to prepare_cached()

title: T150l-m: Activity validation tests
description: Test create_activity with: icon >20 chars, edge case color formats (#RGB, #12345, RGB)
